something_went_wrong: Something went wrong while contacting server. We are sorry for the inconvinience.
could_not_determine_booking_time: Please specify timing details. For e.g. from 4 pm to 5pm or at 4pm for 1 hour

room_cancellation_confirmation: This will cancel the current room cancellation operation. Are you sure?
room_cancellation_stop: Cancel booking operation has been cancelled.
